§ 30909. Security Neither the United States nor a federally-owned corporation may be required to give a bond or admiralty stipulation in a civil action under this chapter. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 6(c), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1519.)
Historical and Revision Notes
